nodes.text: Mister Fan was a model of small and mass-produced portable fan droids manufactured by the Resistance during their operations on Batuu. They were sold to the planet's locals at the Resistance Supply as a way to show support for the Resistance. Their designs were made to be reminiscent of moisture vaporators as they could also provide water with their cool breeze.
Mister Fans are misting fans sold at Disneyland's Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge theme park.
